cause_of_action: ongoing disputes over election validity and removal of officials
procedure_followed: judicial review application filed; interlocutory injunction sought to halt by-election and removal decisions
decision_reasoning: irreparable harm in further uncertainty and tension over valid offices
balance of convenience favored maintaining the status quo for the First Nation's best interest
result_of_case: by-election and removal were stayed pending resolution of the underlying judicial review
application_details: applicants argue that holding the by-election would exacerbate uncertainty and irreparably harm the First Nation's governance structure
